clinical_study.brief_title: Septic Pseudarthrosis Of Long Bone : Experience In A Regional Reference Center

brief_summary.textblock: Description of septic pseudarthrosis with chirurgical treatment in two steps (first step : Implementation of cement, second step : bone reconstruction, with or without device)

primary_outcome.measure: Description of treatment of septic pseudarthrosis : chirurgical treatment - rate of use of this type of chirurgical treatment among patients with septic pseudarthrosis
primary_outcome.time_frame: Outcome is measured at the end of follow-up (usually between 12 and 24 months after antibiotic therapy disruption)
primary_outcome.description: Description of treatment of septic pseudarthrosis : chirurgical treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Description of treatment of septic pseudarthrosis : medical treatment - duration of treatment in patients having sepstic pseudarthrosis
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Outcome is measured at the end of follow-up (usually between 12 and 24 months after antibiotic therapy disruption)
secondary_outcome.description: Description of treatment of septic pseudarthrosis : medical treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Treatment failure : rate of failure with this 2 times chirurgical treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Outcome is measured at the end of follow-up (usually between 12 and 24 months after antibiotic therapy disruption)
secondary_outcome.description: Treatment failure is defined by local clinical and/or microbiological relapse; and/or need for additional surgery; death of septic origin
